text: Dorothea Ida Eveliina Witikka (born Dorothea Ida Eveliina Ista; 12 December 1932 - 20 February 2014), better known by her stage name Tea Ista, was a Finnish actress. She began her acting career in 1952. She was born in Evij√§rvi. Ista died after a serious illness on 20 February 2014 in Espoo. She was aged 81. She was outlived by her daughter, Minna Maria, with her late husband Jack Witikka. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Finnish television actors Category:Finnish movie actors Category:Finnish stage actors
title: Tea Ista
